name: Ration Bars
description:
About this item
Food Bar, 2400 Calories. 
Each bar is 18 ounces / Precut into 6 pieces. 
Finally! Not only a food ration that tastes great, but is also very nutritious. 
Our 2400 calorie bars are approved by the US Coast Guard as well as the Canadian Transport Department and have a 5 year shelf life. 
All food bars have that great taste of apple cinnamon. Food rations can be stored outside up to 149 degrees (f) and can be eaten without preparation.

name: 30 Day Emergency Food Storage
description:
The 30-Day Emergency Food Storage Pail is your ideal short term survival solution. The sole purpose of this inventive bucketful of security is to provide food for one person for a month in a `grab `n go pail. The pouches contain hearty dishes, great for survival, such as creamy potato soup, cheesy broccoli and rice, maple oatmeal and instant potatoes. The included meal planning guide offers a wide range of appetizing combinations, making it easy to mix and match meals for variety. 

Materials: Resealable mylar pouches
Dimensions: 17.5 inches high 12.5 inches wide x 12.5 inches long
Storage: Cool dry enviornment
Package Contents:
Transportable, watertight, 6-gallon pail contains food pouches with a shelf life of up to 20 years.
A 30-day supply of delicious, easy-to-prepare food for one person
Or a week of food for four people
Contains 300 servings
1,857 calories per day
20 year shelf life
Packaged in convenient, easy-to-use pouches
A 30-day and 45-day meal planner
No high fructose corn syrup or trans fats
Meals require only minutes to prepare, just add water and cook
This pail features eight food varieties in pouches sealed with oxygen absorbers or nitrogen flushed:
Instant potatoes: 30 servings
Macaroni and cheese: 30 servings
Creamy potato soup: 30 servings
Cheesy broccoli rice: 30 servings
Creamy chicken rice: 30 servings
Hearty vegetable blend: 30 servings
Maple brown sugar oatmeal: 40 servings
Morning Moo's low fat milk alternative: 80 servings
Expiration: Up to 20 Years. Sealed/Opened to 1 year

description:
Available in

ACU

ATACS

Shell: DINTEX soft shell Spandex & Polyester

*Deep slash pockets in chest *Earphone ports built in

  Cuffs

Jacket orders will be placed with the manufacturer as we get them to keep our costs (overhead) down and pass the savings on to you. Delivery is approximately 3 weeks.
Make sure you specify your size when ordering!

*** Does tend to run a tad small but no shrinkage so figure it in when ordering.

name: Assault Pack
description:
Product Description

Tactical Back Pack has a large zippered clam-shell main compartment, an internal zippered pocket and a separate divided compartment for a hydration bladder. Other features include padded shoulder straps, waist and sternum straps, two adjustable compression straps on each side of the military back pack, and six external zippered pockets providing ample storage space. The front pockets and bottom of the back pack has PAL compatible webbing to make our Tactical Back Pack a modular system. The back pack also has carry handle straps on the top and on both sides of the back pack. Keep your gear at-the-ready with this Tactical Back Pack.




Features:

The Bag has plenty of space for all of your quick response needs with 7 compartments total making it perfect for First Responders, Emergency personal and preppers.

*Constructed of Tough PVC Material

*Velcro Patches to accommodate Hook and Loop accessories

*PALS Webbing on Front, Sides and Bottom to add anything you need to get the job done and breathable mesh backing for comfort

*Removable and adjustable carry strap with shoulder pad

name: MOLLE Panel
description:
Our very own MOLLE Panel

Made to MIL. SPEC. here in the USA

Use as any of the below or think of your own use.
Trunk organizer
Tailgate organizer
Bed rail organizer
Seat organizer
Safe organizer
Locker organizer

Hook & loop Velcro mounted to the back.
6 grommets hidden in the back for endless mounting options.

Our no-drill design can be easily installed using Flat Straps, 550 Cord, Webbing, Carabineers, Velcro, Snap Hooks, Bed Rail Clamps or Bolts.

Removable design allows for bugging out in seconds with gear.

1000D Cordura with Mil Spec MOLLE on front, Velcro on back, and three sets of hidden Grommet mount points.

 

Low cost basic multi-use designed by Law Enforcement & Military professionals for all applications.

name: S&W Air Weight Knife
description:
Light weight fixed blade knife.
Ergonomiclly crafted for a balanced feel in your hand.
ABS plastic handle provides a secure and slip resistant grip.
Comes in to styles. 
ABS plastic sheath is highly durable and impact resistant.
Rescue whistle designed into sheath.
Designed to be worn around the neck and be completely unnoticeable.

name: S&W Tactical penlight
description:
S&W Tactical Penlight
Bright LED light
Runs on 2 AAA batteries (included)
10,000 hour bulb burn time
Metal glass breaking tip for home or auto
Spear tip for self defense (pressure points)
Made of light weight and durable T-6 aluminum
Stylish matte black finish

name: First Aid Kit with optional Blow Out Kit (IPOK)
description:
43 Pcs kit that includes:

Bandages
Instrument
Meds
Durable ACU camo backpack

Kit is not US ARMY issued. Bag was a US ARMY recruitment PROMo item and does have the US ARMY logo on the front. A described it was only used as promotional handouts but does make a good base for your home first aid kit, Bug-Out bag or 72 hour bag.
Backpack has 1 medium external pocket and 1 map pocket additional to its large capacity main compartment.

Perfect starter for making your own "Bug-out medic kit" or starting your own custom "Go-bag".

Bag is made of 1000D polyester and ballistic nylon
Water resistant
Padded shoulder straps for comfort
Dimensions: 17" x 12.25" x 6.50"

Options include:
*Blowout kit for heavy bleeds and gunshot wound treatment

*Disposable stretcher made of 1000D nylon with full webbing support
Making it light weight, durable & dependable.

name: Drop Leg Bag
description:
Drop leg bag makes a perfect addition to your bug out gear. 
One size fits most.

Available in Khaki, Digital ACU, Digital Woodland, OD Green only (Black is do in soon)

Features
*Water resistant design.
*Keep your hand free while you are camping, hunting or traveling.
*Flexible main storage compartment
With adjustable waist and drop leg straps.
*Two side zippered pockets.
*Great for campers, hikers, fisherman and Preppers.
*Made of condura nylon and polyester.
*Dual mag pouches.
*Large central compartment. 


** Compared to the "Thermite Verspack" at a cost of $46.00 to $67.00 you just can't go wrong!

Multi-Cam, OD Green, Black and ACU Digital are on back order. Will ship upon being received at our storage facility. 
PRE-ORDER DROP LEG BAGS REDUCED TILL IN STOCK

name: Load Out Bag
description:
There is plenty of room in this Tactical carrier  for all your vital good that with ordinary bags you would have to leave behind. It's comfortable, strong and built right.
Rugged ACU Digital Polyester exterior

A smaller version of the popular Mojo load out bag, it has the same great features but 3/4 the size. With 11 assorted size exterior pouches, lots of webbing to attach more pouches, double-zip access to the main compartment, double compression straps on each end, 8 metal "D" ring attachment points abound, top clear ID window, wrap-around carry handle, adjustable removable shoulder strap with movable pad and when the load gets too heavy, we've provided a padded, adjustable shoulder strap harness that conceals in the bottom of the bag when not needed.

Measures: 31"L x 15 1/2"W x 14"L
8,568 cu/in capacity

name: SHTF own Tactical Sling Bag
description:
Our own tactical sling bag. Designed to take everything life has to throw at it. Designed with a padded adjustable shoulder strap this bag will feel great on the go. Three (03) exterior pockets and plenty of molle webbing so that you can add to the bag. Designed to be comfortable, functional, water resistant, durable and most importantly affordable.

Why spend a small fortune on a bag to carry your preps when you can get a cost effective alternative and put the extra money into your prepping budget.

* Khaki & OD Green coming soon

Color may vary slightly do to pattern

Back Orders discounted till back in stock so order now and save.

name: SHTF own Bail-Out Bag
description:
Our very own "Bail Out Bag". 
Would make a great choice for an EDC (Every Day Cary). 


The Bail-Out Bag is an durable, ergonomic, day pack. Have all your essential gear securely stored for quick and immediate access while keeping everything organized with 9 different storage compartments. The main compartment with it voluminous 156 cubic inch capacity and cord-lock drawstring storm collar will keep your gear dry and secure. The zippered quick draw pocket is optimally placed for storing a concealed weapon that can quickly and easily be accessed when the need might arise. The half dozen other compartments provide room for cell-phones, radios, keys, flashlights, extra magazines, a water bottle, camera, pens, pencils, notebooks or any other gear that is essential for your daily adventures. 

Made to survive everything from environment , the 1000 denier polyester shell will hold up to the severest of action and adventure. This pack was designed to move with it's wearer with padding in all the right places, pockets designed for quick and easy access, and a belt securing system designed to hold the pack close to your body during quick action and adventure. 

Features:

-Overall Dimensions: 12.5 inches wide x 10.5 inches tall x 5.5 inches deep 
-Heavy duty 1000D Polyester Construction 
-Ergonomic wear resistant padded points 
-Belt securement system 
-One large draw string compartment with buckle closure 
-Large open top side compartment (water bottle pocket) 
-Large zippered concealed carry compartment 
-Secondary side open top pocket (flashlight pocket) 
-Side phone/radio comm pocket 
-Open top front pocket 
-Zippered front pocket with interior mesh organizer and key ring holder 
-Shoulder strap with quick clasp attachment point 
-MOLLE attachment points

name: Tactical Pen
description:
Our tactical pen is made out of T6 Aluminum to make it light weight and incredibly strong and durable. The pen was designed to be primarily used as a self defense weapon/instrument that doubles as a pen unlike cheaper similar items that are designed with the primary function of being a pen.

Our Tactical Pen is long enough to function as the perfect implement to deliver the perfect wrist lock to control an aggressor and yet still appear as a normal designer pen in your pocket. The tail cap of the pen is pointy enough to be used as a jabbing instruments to deliver a precise strike to a pressure point or a sharp cutting blow.


Order now while awaiting shipment and save....

name: Tactical Apron
description:
For the BBQ fan....
I truly useful and comical gift, a little something for the man who has everything or is just hard to shop for. 
One size fits most.
Molle front allows for total customization.
